code: import React from'react';import clsx from'clsx';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Progress=_ref=>{let{value,max=100,className,color='emerald',size='md',showValue=false,...props}=_ref;const percentage=Math.min(Math.max(value/max*100,0),100);const sizes={sm:'h-1',md:'h-2',lg:'h-3'};const colors={emerald:'bg-emerald-500',blue:'bg-blue-500',red:'bg-red-500',yellow:'bg-yellow-500',purple:'bg-purple-500'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:clsx('bg-gray-200 rounded-full overflow-hidden',sizes[size],className),...props,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:clsx('h-full transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out',colors[color]),style:{width:`${percentage}%`}})}),showValue&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"absolute right-0 -top-6 text-sm text-gray-600",children:[percentage,"%"]})]});};export default Progress;
